pages.text: The soul of the potion rejects your call$(br)But the witch's grimoire allows you to still make a bowl of soup, perhaps its unique taste will help you understand the essence of potion brewing$(br)Stir with a stick to appreciate its unique flavor.

Can be thrown like a potion bottle, giving debuffs to nearby entities.$(b)(Nausea (30s), random level 2 to 5 Poison (30s), Weakness II (30s))$()Can also be crafted with potion brews on a crafting table, resulting in a potion brew, but the brew's debuff level will increase by one (up to three levels max)
